title: [Watch]: Paint Addiction on SA’s Got Talent
content:
Last week (Sunday, 27 September) on SA’s Got Talent speed painters, Paint Addiction blew the country away with their skill and creativity.  
 
SA’s Go Talent Sundays at 6.05PM.  
 
For most of the episode, DJ Fresh was ready to take a snooze that was until Paint Addition woke him right up. After initially buzzing them after only a couple of seconds, Fresh was properly shocked when the artists revealed a portrait of himself! “I’m gonna eat a humble pie and say I was wrong. That was fantastic.” 
 
With three yeses, the judges were all in agreement. “It’s like magic,” Shado exclaimed. “My hat’s off to you guys,” Lalla added.
